itemDescription: Acting governor of Bombay during the British Raj from 13 March 1880 to 28 April 1880 and amateur photographer

wikipedia_page.main: Lionel Robert Ashburner    (1827 in Tasmania – 26 January 1907 in Marylebone, London) was the Acting governor of Bombay during the British Raj from 13 March 1880 to 28 April 1880.

link_mentions.page: List of governors of Bombay Presidency

response: *Lionel Robert Ashburner, Bombay Civil Service, Collector and Magistrate of Kandeish
